Name: ACAENA microphylla Kupferteppich (Copper Carpet)
Description: Good groundcover plant for a dry, sunny position. Red foliage is covered by many bright red burrs in summer.  Delightful planted with dwarf spring bulbs.

Name: ABELIA Edward Goucher 
Description: Bushy small shrub, usually evergreen, whose glossy green leaves are bronze when young.  Lilac pink flowers over a long period from summer to autumn.  Good for most soil conditions but best kept away from cold winds.

Name: ABELIA grandiflora
Description: Bushy medium sized shrub, usually evergreen whose glossy green leaves are bronze when young.  White slightly fragrant flowers are tinged pale pink.  Good for most soil conditions but best kept away from cold winds.

Name: ACER palmatum
Description: Japanese maple.  Small tree with deeply lobed green leaves that turn wonderful shades of orange and red in autumn.  Small red flowers in spring lead to winged fruits in autumn.  Best in sheltered areas to prevent leaf scorch.

Name: ACER palmatum Atropurpureum
Description: Japanese maple.  Small tree with deeply lobed dark purple leaves that turn wonderful shades of red in autumn.  Small red flowers in spring lead to winged fruits in autumn.  Best in sheltered areas to prevent leaf scorch.
